Hey, guys! I just wanted to warn... I mean, announce that I made a new game, A Pokemon Vore Adventure!

Go on a Pokemon vore adventure.

You play as a trainer, who just fell into a Pokemon Leather Dungeon. The Pokemon there are into BDSM and vore.

Will you make it out of the dungeon alive?
